abstract: Vonage can sign up new customers as well as maintain service to existing ones as it pursues its appeal of a earlier ruling that it infringed three Verizon patents.
snippet: Vonage can sign up new customers as well as maintain service to existing ones as it pursues its appeal of a earlier ruling that it infringed three Verizon patents.
lead_paragraph: Vonage, the Internet phone company embroiled in a bitter patent suit with Verizon, is still in business, at least for now.

headline.main: Appeals Court Allows Net Phone Company to Continue Signing Up New Customers
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Allows Net Phone Company to Continue Signing Up New Customers
